title: Tim to the seashore
creator_credit: Gateway Film Productions, Anthony Larsen, Sam Pillsbury and Rod Prosser
brief_description:
Short non-narrated film of a small boy’s meanderings and discoveries along a beach. Aims to assist in the development of communication skills.
Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
creator_credit_for_label: Gateway Film Productions, Anthony Larsen, Sam Pillsbury and Rod Prosser
